companyName: U.S. Equity Ex-Dividend Fund Series 2027 Shares
description:
The investment seeks long term returns by replicating the price returns of the SPDR S&P 500® ETF (SPY) while being credited up front for the 10-years of ordinary dividends via a lower initial purchase price, as represented by the Solactive US Ex-Dividends Index—Series 2027.
The manager intends to replicate the returns of SPY through owning long positions in quarterly S&P 500 Index futures contracts traded on the CME rather than shares of SPY. Additionally, the manager intends to track the performance of the Solactive Ex-Dividend Index by selling annual S&P 500 Dividend Futures Contracts out to the maturity date of the fund.
